Text: This is a huge issue that would compromise the privacy of users. But Wilson has yet to find hard evidence that they plan to do this. What should i do?
Option1: We should report this to the higher ups immediately| even if there is no evidence. It is not our responsibility to investigate and confront the other team.
Option2: Wilson and I should keep quiet about it and do some more investigating before reporting this. If we find something| then we'll confront them.
Option3: Not our client| not our project| not our problem. At the very least| they're bringing extra money into the company.
